```
class Person
  def self.species
    "Homo Sapien"
  end
end

class Person
  class << self
    def species
      "Homo Sapien"
    end
  end
end

class << Person
  def species
    "Homo Sapien"
  end
end

Person.instance_eval do
  def species
    "Homo Sapien"
  end
end

def Person.species
  "Homo Sapien"
end 
```

```
class Person
  def name
    "Matz"
  end
end

Person.class_eval do
  def name
    "Matz"
  end
end 
```

```
class Person
end

Person.class #=> Class

class Class
  def loud_name
    "#{name.upcase}!"
  end
end

Person.loud_name #=> "PERSON!" 
```

```
matz = Object.new
def matz.speak
  "Place your burden to machine's shoulders"
end 
```

```
matz = Object.new
def matz.speak
  "Place your burden to machine's shoulders"
end

matz.class #=> Object 
```

```
metaclass = class << matz; self; end
metaclass.instance_methods.grep(/speak/) #=> ["speak"] 
```

```
class Person
  def name
    "Matz"
  end

  self.name #=> "Person"
end 
```

```
Person.class_eval do
  def name
    "Matz"
  end

  self.name #=> "Person"
end 
```

```
class Person
  def self.species
    "Homo Sapien"
  end

  self.name #=> "Person"
end 
```

```
class << Person
  def species
    "Homo Sapien"
  end

  self.name #=> ""
end 
```

```
class Person
  class << self
    def species
      "Homo Sapien"
    end

    self.name #=> ""
  end
end 
```

```
Person.instance_eval do
  def species
    "Homo Sapien"
  end

  self.name #=> "Person"
end 
```
